content: Thomas Schneider's HomepageSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationThomas SchneiderPhoto: TU Darmstadt/Katrin BinnerI am a full professor for Cryptography and Privacy Engineering (ENCRYPTO) at the Department of Computer Science of Technical University of Darmstadt, Germany.My research interests are in the areas of privacy, cryptographic protocols, applied cryptography, and IT security.Enjoy browsing my website to learn more about my professional activities, publications, and personal and contact information.Google SitesReport abusePage detailsPage updated Google SitesReport abuse
